Steps.Message: Update at 08:17 - We're very sorry we've had to switch off your electricity. Our engineers have turned off the power in the PE17 2, PE28 2, PE28 3 area in the interest of the public's health and safety. This is so they can investigate reports of a grounded overhead line. The estimated time to have you back on is between 14:30 and 15:30. We'll keep you updated with our progress.

We became aware of this power cut at 07:44. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut, but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly. Engineers in our control room have switched some customers power back on in your area. To get everyone’s power back on we may need to attend to investigate and make repairs. We’ll continue to update you until everyone’s power is back on.
Steps.Name: We are restoring customers automatically

Logs.Comment: Update at 08:17 - We're very sorry we've had to switch off your electricity. Our engineers have turned off the power in the PE17 2, PE28 2, PE28 3 area in the interest of the public's health and safety. This is so they can investigate reports of a grounded overhead line. The estimated time to have you back on is between 14:30 and 15:30. We'll keep you updated with our progress.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: We had to turn off power in your area so our engineers could safely carry out emergency repairs to the network.
